"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544da209636872245c910000#post_544da209636872245c910000

Yes, i really hate how ,my post sure could have been perceived as kind of mocking for a "serious thread", but they had to add "drugs are innapropriate"

-They have an entire thread about MLG montage.

-There is an user with an avatar of RD smoking kush.

-Thead about marihuana legalization.

Also because i posted a tyler tweet on my wall that had the text nigga on it, which again can be cause of a ban, IF IT WASNT for the fact that image has been there ever since i joined the site on like may, a wall where a MOD had already seen before.

I feel they just wanted more ammo to get me out.

And i dont know if it is shitty coding or intentional but i cant contact the mods even thought it gives me a link for that
